content: **knitted hat and wrist-warmers in 1 strand drops melody or 2 strands drops brushed alpaca silk ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the oslo chill wrist-warmers pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #oslochillset drops design pattern ml-135 yarn group d ------------------------------------------------------- * **whole set ** **sizes** s/m - m/l - l/xl **yarn for whole set** drops melody from garnstudio belongs to yarn group d 100-100-100 g colour 04 grey or use drops brushed alpaca silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 75-75-100 g colour 03 grey **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 22 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 4 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches within 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches within 10 cm change to a smaller needle size ------------------------------------------------------- * **hat** **sizes** s/m - m/l - l/xl fits head-size 54/56 - 56/58 - 58/60 cm **yarn for hat** drops melody from garnstudio belongs to yarn group d 50-100-100 g colour 04 grey or use drops brushed alpaca silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50-75-75 g colour 03 grey **needles for hat** drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 40 cm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/261-47-olso-chill-wrist-warmers
